item.description:
The Brattle Theatre's recurring Doctor Who showings are back again! They're doing two Fourth Doctor Serials and a showing of one of the latest Eleventh Doctor two-parters.  The show starts at 9:30. Here's the synopsis for Saturday's episode:

"The Doctor and Sarah find themselves in the English village of Devesham near a Space Defence Station. But the village seems deserted, the telephones don't work, calendars are stuck on the same date and suited figures are wandering about aimlessly. Who are the Kraals, and what are their plans for Earth?"

http://brattlefilm.org/2012/01/21/hooked-on-who-2/
item.how_to_find_us: I'll try to have a red Meetup sign with me, but look for the large group of us congregating outside the theater!
item.name: Hooked On Who: The Android Invasion
